name: Claude Code
description: Interactive CLI tool for software engineering tasks powered by Claude AI

slashCommands.details: Users can create custom slash commands in .claude/commands/ directory

multiFileEditing.details: Can read, edit, and create multiple files in parallel

codebaseUnderstanding.details: Uses specialized Explore agents for codebase exploration and analysis

gitIntegration.details: Full git support including commits, branches, and PR creation via gh CLI

terminalAccess.details: Can execute bash commands with proper sandboxing

webSearch.details: Built-in web search and fetch capabilities

mcpServers.details: Supports Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers for extensibility

parallelAgents.details: Can launch multiple specialized agents for complex tasks
